description:
YouTube Interactive is a course that teaches how to set up your YouTube account to allow you to add clickable links to your website in your videos. It is broken into to major parts.

Part 1: Step-by-step instructions on how to set up your YouTube channel with the ability to add clickable links to your videos.

Part 2: In this portion, you learn how to add interactive and animated buttons to your videos to vastly improve viewer click-throughs.

We also have a number of support materials, such as interactive buttons to use in your videos, plus a video starter pack which includes royalty-free music, video graphics and more.
title: YouTube Interactive: Add clickable buttons to your videos
